#bitcoin  price can go down, but realized cap not so much, thanks to hodlers. In fact realized cap (average cost price of all 19M BTC / 80M utxo) is near ATH at $466B. I have no doubt that realized cap will lead BTC to next price ATH. I expect $100K BTC at ~$750B realized cap. https://t.co/ZpMuFcnYxl
